task.summary:
Add Writerside documentation project setup and CI workflow
This commit introduces the initial Writerside documentation project setup, including configuration files, topic structure, sample content, and library snippets. It also adds a GitHub Actions CI workflow to build, test, and deploy the documentation to GitHub Pages.

Update Docker version in CI and adjust workspace settings
Upgraded the Docker version in the CI configuration file for compatibility improvements. Adjusted IntelliJ workspace settings, including Git preferences, default account, and task configurations to streamline development workflow. Added metadata related to the Writerside documentation project setup.

Update CI artifact handling and Docker version
Refactored artifact naming to dynamically generate values in the CI workflow, improving flexibility and maintainability. Upgraded the Docker version for compatibility enhancements. Adjusted IntelliJ workspace metadata for better task and project configuration.

Update CI artifact path and adjust IntelliJ workspace metadata
Refined the artifact path in the GitHub Actions workflow for improved clarity and stability. Updated IntelliJ workspace metadata, addressing task configurations and streamlining project settings. These changes enhance workflow maintainability and compatibility.

Update CI artifact path and adjust IntelliJ workspace metadata
Refined the artifact path in the GitHub Actions workflow for better clarity and reliability. Updated IntelliJ workspace metadata to improve task management and streamline project settings. These changes enhance maintainability and compatibility of the workflow.

Update CI artifact handling and IntelliJ workspace metadata
Added dynamic environment variable generation for artifact handling in the CI workflow to improve flexibility and reliability. Updated IntelliJ workspace metadata to streamline task management and project settings. These changes enhance maintainability and compatibility across the workflow.

Update CI artifact handling and refine workspace configuration
Added dynamic environment variables for CI artifact handling to enhance flexibility and reliability. Updated IntelliJ workspace metadata to streamline task management and improve project settings. These changes boost workflow maintainability and compatibility.
